column3: 今日は付き添わなくて良いと伝えたはずです
column4:
I thought I made it clear that I am not
in need of an escort.

column3:
いくら国王の命令であっても
当の私が護衛など必要無いと言っているのです
column4:
It seems I'm the only one with a mind of my own.I, the person in question, am fine, regardless
of the king's orders.

column3: 城に戻り父にそう伝えて下さい
column4: Return to the castle.And tell that to my father, please.

column3: 付いて来ないで下さい！

この型の遺物は退魔の剣に選ばれた者の為の施設……
それは間違いないけれど
column4:
Hmm...It appears that this structure was designed to be
exclusively accessed by the sword's chosen one.

column3: 肝心の起動方法が解らない……
column4:
But designs can always be worked
around, at least I hope.

column3: どうすれば この中に入る事が……
column4: How do I get inside...?I need to activate it somehow.
